review: Works great! I can watch what I have on my Google tablet on my TV!
author: cherel bryant

review: Pretty awesome. Highly recommend for people without a smart t.v.
author: Billy Morelock

review: The functionality of the Chromecast is excellent....easy to use and hook up....but it's very proprietary and only works with certain sites like YouTube..didn't know that when I purchased it......but as I dug deeper there are work arounds...wink-wink....good overall product
author: Peter J. Antisen "Medmann41"

review: This is awesome. My apartment changed the security on the WiFi so I can no longer use it as of now but when I was able to use it it was great. I watch Netflix a lot using chrome through my phone (was a bit falky) and my laptop. I was able to play music and share my browser through the TV. I heard there are more features coming soon. I can't wait.
author: Jay

review: Works ok lots of time I have to reboot it to work. Not enough apps available yet.
author: D

review: Great product. I can watch Netflix, connect your laptop to it and watch it over your TV. Very portable. Installation very easy.  Had no problems ever since I bought this.
author: F. Obregon

review: one of may favorite devices in the house now.
author: alexg
